effect.sun_moon: Boosts the power of the target’s moves by 50% until the end of this turn. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Boosts the power of the target’s moves by 50% until the end of this turn. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Boosts the power of the target’s moves by 50% until the end of this turn. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

short_effect.sun_moon: Ally’s next move inflicts half more damage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Ally’s next move inflicts half more damage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Ally’s next move inflicts half more damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally’s attack.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally’s attack.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally’s attack.
